ingredients.ingredient: 1 tablespoon almond butter, or to taste
½ Granny Smith apple, cored and thinly sliced

cookingTips: Slice apple thinly and toss with lemon juice to prevent browning
Toast bread lightly before assembling for better texture and structural integrity
Assemble sandwich just before eating to keep bread from becoming soggy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This vegetarian sandwich combines protein and fresh produce. How does the apple add complexity to the flavor profile?
